post_text: Panther Families ALL students attending this school year, through distance learning or hybrid must have a Bridge Academy Chromebook. Please call and make an appointment to grab one.
text: Panther Families ALL students attending this school year, through distance learning or hybrid must have a Bridge Academy Chromebook. Please call and make an appointment to grab one.

post_text:
Don’t forget to fill out the survey to let the school know if you plan on participating in distance learning when school begins. Please know that you may change yourself mind at any time by giving the school a call. Telling us your plans helps us to plan for our return to school.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe4PkC4pffpAoCIBaKIw3zJzZmSam5KPM9YBcU1xfVr1RJSfA/viewform?usp=sf_link

City of Bridgeport, CT - Government
May 9 at 6:45 AM ·

HAPPENING TODAY !
Saturday May 9, 10am - 2pm
(or until supplies last).

DRIVE UP ONLY

*If you do not have transportation, call the EOC at (203) 579-3829. Arrangements will be made to deliver masks during the week.*

#bridgeport residents are required to show proof of residency (vehicle registration or utility bill) along with Driver’s License for verification.

#BPTUpdates #FacialMask #Coronavirus #MaskDistribution

Even though we are all home, practicing safe social distancing with our loved ones. Guess what?! Bridge Academy just made applying that much easier.

-Visit our website www.bridgeacademy.org
-parents & students tab
-application 2020-2021
-"click here" button in burgundy letters.

See that was easier then figuring out your childs Google classroom account. (We have a parent class for that 😉)

BTW, I heard we have 5, 7th grade slots still available!

shared_text:
Connecticut State Department of Education
February 18 at 11:27 AM ·

Elaine Roper teaches English at The Bridge Academy Charter School in #Bridgeport, where she works every day to make change in her students’ lives. Elaine says, "It’s important for students of color to see themselves represented in the people who teach them."

Read Elaine's story and learn more about TEACH Connecticut's #BlackTeacherTalk Twitter chat for #BlackHistoryMonth on February 26: https://ontch.org/2GZdvMj.

Black History Month
For Black History Month, we amplify the stories of those in our communities working for a more diverse, inclusive teaching force. The short month of February doesn't do justice to these leaders in education.

Black History Month
For Black History Month, we amplify the stories of those in our communities working for a more diverse, inclusive teaching force. The short month of February doesn't do justice to these leaders in education.

See more at
teach.org

Hey Panther Families, we are currently looking to fill slots in select grades. So tell a friend to let a neighbor know, that we are accepting applications right now. Like right now today! Don't miss out on this great educational opportunity for a child you may know.

Go to bridgeacademy.org and fill out an application or call 203-336-9999.

Summer offices hours: Monday- Friday 7:30am -4:30pm

post_text:
Do you know that Bridge Academy is holding a poetry contest this April? Top prize is $250 dollars! Contest rules are:

1. Be a sixth grader in a Bridgeport school
2. Print, fill out and submit poetry application by March 22nd
3. Boom you've already increased your chances to win.

post_text:
Dear Friends,

Fairfield County's Giving Day 2019 is coming up on February 28. Please consider donating to The Bridge Academy, a charter school in Bridgeport serving 280 students every year in grades 7 - 12. Information about our school, including our fundraising focus and a donation link can be found by visiting our page online.

https://www.fcgives.org/organizations/the-bridge-academy

Please donate on February 28 and spread the word!

Looking for a great free school for your child in Bridgeport? The Bridge Academy Charter School is looking for current 6th graders to apply to our 7th grade class starting in September 2019. Apply now! Bridge Academy has a nearly 100% college acceptance rate, and is accepting applications now.

shared_text:
Ricky Mestre
December 20, 2018 at 7:45 PM ·

Hearing about the senseless killing of a 12 year old boy in Bridgeport was heartbreaking. Reading that he was from The Bridge Academy made this a little more personal for someone who had spent years working as a staff member there with all those great kids. I have to offer my thoughts, prayers, condolences and this tribute drawing to the family. If anyone can, please consider making a donation to his gofund me page: https://www.gofundme.com/funeral-cost-expenses-for-clinton-howell?utm_source=facebook&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=fb_dn_postdonate_r&fbclid=IwAR2ppecPNxV3cOsjAWbwzU7GXMRNrnn5KJmcL__vPFmhUEhdjljsSKswrxY

post_text: It with great sadness that we share the news of the passing of Clinton Howell, a 7th grade student at our school. Even though Clinton began coming to our school just this year, many in our school community have known him for a much longer time. Clinton was an amazing person: kind, gentle, hardworking and happy. In such a short amount of time, he made quite a positive impact on all of us. Our thoughts and prayers are with Clinton’s family, as well as with our entire school community, during this difficult time. Rest In Peace, Clinton. We will miss you.
text: It with great sadness that we share the news of the passing of Clinton Howell, a 7th grade student at our school. Even though Clinton began coming to our school just this year, many in our school community have known him for a much longer time. Clinton was an amazing person: kind, gentle, hardworking and happy. In such a short amount of time, he made quite a positive impact on all of us. Our thoughts and prayers are with Clinton’s family, as well as with our entire school community, during this difficult time. Rest In Peace, Clinton. We will miss you.

post_text: On average a single person spends at least 90 minutes on their phone daily. Why not take 2 minutes to subscribe to Bridge Academy's remind tool. Get information for delays, cancellations and important school events. Just text @bridgeaca to 81010. Its that simple.
